price: en un lugar honorable, junto al Soberano Todopoderoso.
arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fī maqʿadi ṣid'qin ʿinda malīkin muq'tadirin
